title: Separation of Powers More Likely in Democracies

content.question: Why is Nigeria more likely to have a separation of powers than China?

choices.label: Separate branches in Nigeria prevent governmental power from residing in a small group of leaders.
A separation of powers allows the Nigerian executive to more efficiently enforce the laws.
Separate branches in Nigeria allow for more policies to be written by the legislative branch.
Judiciaries are empowered to police their own rulings in the Nigerian system of separated powers.

content.answer: Separate branches in Nigeria prevent governmental power from residing in a small group of leaders.
